E-Mail Messages
Date: Wednesday, 4/9/1990
Subject: Mike Davis
Mike Davis is ready to be activated from the DL!

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Progress of Alex Fernandez
Dear Sir,
Alex Fernandez has nothing more to prove at AA Chattanooga Lookouts!
He has an ERA of 1.04 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Progress of Tony Eusebio
Dear Sir,
Tony Eusebio has an AVG of .375 at AA Chattanooga Lookouts!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director

Date: Thursday, 5/22/1990
Subject: Contract extension
Hello,
I just wanted to let you know that I'm
in my last year of the contract.
Are you interested in giving me an extension?
I'd be happy to play for you again next year!

Regards,
Tom Henke



Date: Thursday, 5/22/1990
Subject: Contract extension question
Dear Sir,
My contract expires after this season.
I would like to resign, so please let's talk!

Regards,
Rick Engle



Date: Friday, 5/23/1990
Subject: Extension?
Hello Sir,
Are you interested in negotiating a contract extension?
You know, I'm in my final year. I'd like to stay here!

Sincerely,
Hiromichi Ishige
